description:
These chill sunnies like patio season as much as you do. Whether you are out getting things done, or just kicking back, the Barclay’s large lenses keep your vision clear.

  • Anti-slip nose pads and temple tips help keep the glasses in place
  • Grilamid TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses
  • 6-base lens curve provides great coverage without restricting air flow
name: Ryders Eyewear Barclay Sunglasses - Unisex
